    32  type Bucket interface {
    33  	GetCreateBucketApproval(ctx context.Context, createBucketMsg *storageTypes.MsgCreateBucket) (*storageTypes.MsgCreateBucket, error)
    34  	// CreateBucket get approval of creating bucket and send createBucket txn to greenfield chain
    35  	// primaryAddr indicates the HEX-encoded string of the primary storage provider address to which the bucket will be created
    36  	CreateBucket(ctx context.Context, bucketName string, primaryAddr string, opts types.CreateBucketOptions) (string, error)
    37  	DeleteBucket(ctx context.Context, bucketName string, opt types.DeleteBucketOption) (string, error)
    38  
    39  	UpdateBucketVisibility(ctx context.Context, bucketName string, visibility storageTypes.VisibilityType, opt types.UpdateVisibilityOption) (string, error)
    40  	UpdateBucketInfo(ctx context.Context, bucketName string, opts types.UpdateBucketOptions) (string, error)
    41  	UpdateBucketPaymentAddr(ctx context.Context, bucketName string, paymentAddr sdk.AccAddress, opt types.UpdatePaymentOption) (string, error)
    42  
    43  	HeadBucket(ctx context.Context, bucketName string) (*storageTypes.BucketInfo, error)
    44  	HeadBucketByID(ctx context.Context, bucketID string) (*storageTypes.BucketInfo, error)
    45  	// PutBucketPolicy put the bucket policy to the principal, return the txn hash
    46  	// the principal can be generated by NewPrincipalWithAccount or NewPrincipalWithGroupId
    47  	PutBucketPolicy(ctx context.Context, bucketName string, principal types.Principal, statements []*permTypes.Statement, opt types.PutPolicyOption) (string, error)
    48  	// DeleteBucketPolicy delete the bucket policy of the principal，return the txn hash
    49  	// the principal can be generated by NewPrincipalWithAccount or NewPrincipalWithGroupId
    50  	DeleteBucketPolicy(ctx context.Context, bucketName string, principal types.Principal, opt types.DeletePolicyOption) (string, error)
    51  	// GetBucketPolicy get the bucket policy info of the user specified by principalAddr.
    52  	// principalAddr indicates the HEX-encoded string of the principal address
    53  	GetBucketPolicy(ctx context.Context, bucketName string, principalAddr string) (*permTypes.Policy, error)
    54  	// IsBucketPermissionAllowed check if the permission of bucket is allowed to the user.
    55  	// userAddr indicates the HEX-encoded string of the user address
    56  	IsBucketPermissionAllowed(ctx context.Context, userAddr string, bucketName string, action permTypes.ActionType) (permTypes.Effect, error)
    57  
    58  	ListBuckets(ctx context.Context) (types.ListBucketsResult, error)
    59  	ListBucketReadRecord(ctx context.Context, bucketName string, opts types.ListReadRecordOptions) (types.QuotaRecordInfo, error)
    60  
    61  	BuyQuotaForBucket(ctx context.Context, bucketName string, targetQuota uint64, opt types.BuyQuotaOption) (string, error)
    62  	GetBucketReadQuota(ctx context.Context, bucketName string) (types.QuotaInfo, error)
    63  	// ListBucketsByBucketID list buckets by bucket ids
    64  	ListBucketsByBucketID(ctx context.Context, bucketIds []uint64) (types.ListBucketsByBucketIDResponse, error)
    65  }
    66  
    67  // GetCreateBucketApproval returns the signature info for the approval of preCreating resources
    68  func (c *client) GetCreateBucketApproval(ctx context.Context, createBucketMsg *storageTypes.MsgCreateBucket) (*storageTypes.MsgCreateBucket, error) {
    69  	unsignedBytes := createBucketMsg.GetSignBytes()
    70  
    71  	// set the action type
    72  	urlVal := make(url.Values)
    73  	urlVal["action"] = []string{types.CreateBucketAction}
    74  
    75  	reqMeta := requestMeta{
    76  		urlValues:     urlVal,
    77  		urlRelPath:    "get-approval",
    78  		contentSHA256: types.EmptyStringSHA256,
    79  		txnMsg:        hex.EncodeToString(unsignedBytes),
    80  	}
    81  
    82  	sendOpt := sendOptions{
    83  		method:     http.MethodGet,
    84  		isAdminApi: true,
    85  	}
    86  
    87  	primarySPAddr := createBucketMsg.GetPrimarySpAddress()
    88  	endpoint, err := c.getSPUrlByAddr(primarySPAddr)
    89  	if err != nil {
    90  		log.Error().Msg(fmt.Sprintf("route endpoint by addr: %s failed, err: %s", primarySPAddr, err.Error()))
    91  		return nil, err
    92  	}
    93  
    94  	resp, err := c.sendReq(ctx, reqMeta, &sendOpt, endpoint)
    95  	if err != nil {
    96  		return nil, err
    97  	}
    98  
    99  	// fetch primary signed msg from sp response
   100  	signedRawMsg := resp.Header.Get(types.HTTPHeaderSignedMsg)
   101  	if signedRawMsg == "" {
   102  		return nil, errors.New("fail to fetch pre createBucket signature")
   103  	}
   104  
   105  	signedMsgBytes, err := hex.DecodeString(signedRawMsg)
   106  	if err != nil {
   107  		return nil, err
   108  	}
   109  
   110  	var signedMsg storageTypes.MsgCreateBucket
   111  	storageTypes.ModuleCdc.MustUnmarshalJSON(signedMsgBytes, &signedMsg)
   112  
   113  	return &signedMsg, nil
   114  }
   115  
   116  // CreateBucket get approval of creating bucket and send createBucket txn to greenfield chain, it returns the transaction hash value and error
   117  func (c *client) CreateBucket(ctx context.Context, bucketName string, primaryAddr string, opts types.CreateBucketOptions) (string, error) {
   118  	address, err := sdk.AccAddressFromHexUnsafe(primaryAddr)
   119  	if err != nil {
   120  		return "", err
   121  	}
   122  
   123  	var visibility storageTypes.VisibilityType
   124  	if opts.Visibility == storageTypes.VISIBILITY_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED {
   125  		visibility = storageTypes.VISIBILITY_TYPE_PRIVATE // set default visibility type
   126  	} else {
   127  		visibility = opts.Visibility
   128  	}
   129  
   130  	var paymentAddr sdk.AccAddress
   131  	if opts.PaymentAddress != "" {
   132  		paymentAddr, err = sdk.AccAddressFromHexUnsafe(opts.PaymentAddress)
   133  		if err != nil {
   134  			return "", err
   135  		}
   136  	}
   137  
   138  	createBucketMsg := storageTypes.NewMsgCreateBucket(c.MustGetDefaultAccount().GetAddress(), bucketName,
   139  		visibility, address, paymentAddr, 0, nil, opts.ChargedQuota)
   140  
   141  	err = createBucketMsg.ValidateBasic()
   142  	if err != nil {
   143  		return "", err
   144  	}
   145  	signedMsg, err := c.GetCreateBucketApproval(ctx, createBucketMsg)
   146  	if err != nil {
   147  		return "", err
   148  	}
   149  
   150  	// set the default txn broadcast mode as block mode
   151  	if opts.TxOpts == nil {
   152  		broadcastMode := tx.BroadcastMode_BROADCAST_MODE_SYNC
   153  		opts.TxOpts = &gnfdsdk.TxOption{Mode: &broadcastMode}
   154  	}
   155  
   156  	resp, err := c.chainClient.BroadcastTx(ctx, []sdk.Msg{signedMsg}, opts.TxOpts)
   157  	if err != nil {
   158  		return "", err
   159  	}
   160  
   161  	var txnResponse *sdk.TxResponse
   162  	txnHash := resp.TxResponse.TxHash
   163  	if !opts.IsAsyncMode {
   164  		ctxTimeout, cancel := context.WithTimeout(ctx, types.ContextTimeout)
   165  		defer cancel()
   166  
   167  		txnResponse, err = c.WaitForTx(ctxTimeout, txnHash)
   168  		if err != nil {
   169  			return txnHash, fmt.Errorf("the transaction has been submitted, please check it later:%v", err)
   170  		}
   171  		if txnResponse.Code != 0 {
   172  			return txnHash, fmt.Errorf("the createBucket txn has failed with response code: %d", txnResponse.Code)
   173  		}
   174  	}
   175  
   176  	return txnHash, nil
   177  }
   178  
   179  // DeleteBucket send DeleteBucket txn to greenfield chain and return txn hash
   180  func (c *client) DeleteBucket(ctx context.Context, bucketName string, opt types.DeleteBucketOption) (string, error) {
   181  	if err := s3util.CheckValidBucketName(bucketName); err != nil {
   182  		return "", err
   183  	}
   184  	delBucketMsg := storageTypes.NewMsgDeleteBucket(c.MustGetDefaultAccount().GetAddress(), bucketName)
   185  	return c.sendTxn(ctx, delBucketMsg, opt.TxOpts)
   186  }
   187  
   188  // UpdateBucketVisibility update the visibilityType of bucket
   189  func (c *client) UpdateBucketVisibility(ctx context.Context, bucketName string,
   190  	visibility storageTypes.VisibilityType, opt types.UpdateVisibilityOption,
   191  ) (string, error) {
   192  	bucketInfo, err := c.HeadBucket(ctx, bucketName)
   193  	if err != nil {
   194  		return "", err
   195  	}
   196  
   197  	paymentAddr, err := sdk.AccAddressFromHexUnsafe(bucketInfo.PaymentAddress)
   198  	if err != nil {
   199  		return "", err
   200  	}
   201  
   202  	updateBucketMsg := storageTypes.NewMsgUpdateBucketInfo(c.MustGetDefaultAccount().GetAddress(), bucketName, &bucketInfo.ChargedReadQuota, paymentAddr, visibility)
   203  	return c.sendTxn(ctx, updateBucketMsg, opt.TxOpts)
   204  }
   205  
   206  // UpdateBucketPaymentAddr  update the payment addr of bucket
   207  func (c *client) UpdateBucketPaymentAddr(ctx context.Context, bucketName string,
   208  	paymentAddr sdk.AccAddress, opt types.UpdatePaymentOption,
   209  ) (string, error) {
   210  	bucketInfo, err := c.HeadBucket(ctx, bucketName)
   211  	if err != nil {
   212  		return "", err
   213  	}
   214  
   215  	updateBucketMsg := storageTypes.NewMsgUpdateBucketInfo(c.MustGetDefaultAccount().GetAddress(), bucketName, &bucketInfo.ChargedReadQuota, paymentAddr, bucketInfo.Visibility)
   216  	return c.sendTxn(ctx, updateBucketMsg, opt.TxOpts)
   217  }
   218  
   219  // UpdateBucketInfo update the bucket meta on chain, including read quota, payment address or visibility
   220  func (c *client) UpdateBucketInfo(ctx context.Context, bucketName string, opts types.UpdateBucketOptions) (string, error) {
   221  	bucketInfo, err := c.HeadBucket(ctx, bucketName)
   222  	if err != nil {
   223  		return "", err
   224  	}
   225  
   226  	if opts.Visibility == bucketInfo.Visibility && opts.PaymentAddress == "" && opts.ChargedQuota == nil {
   227  		return "", errors.New("no meta need to update")
   228  	}
   229  
   230  	var visibility storageTypes.VisibilityType
   231  	var chargedReadQuota uint64
   232  	var paymentAddr sdk.AccAddress
   233  
   234  	if opts.Visibility != bucketInfo.Visibility {
   235  		visibility = opts.Visibility
   236  	} else {
   237  		visibility = bucketInfo.Visibility
   238  	}
   239  
   240  	if opts.PaymentAddress != "" {
   241  		paymentAddr, err = sdk.AccAddressFromHexUnsafe(opts.PaymentAddress)
   242  		if err != nil {
   243  			return "", err
   244  		}
   245  	} else {
   246  		paymentAddr, err = sdk.AccAddressFromHexUnsafe(bucketInfo.PaymentAddress)
   247  		if err != nil {
   248  			return "", err
   249  		}
   250  	}
   251  
   252  	if opts.ChargedQuota != nil {
   253  		chargedReadQuota = *opts.ChargedQuota
   254  	} else {
   255  		chargedReadQuota = bucketInfo.ChargedReadQuota
   256  	}
   257  
   258  	updateBucketMsg := storageTypes.NewMsgUpdateBucketInfo(c.MustGetDefaultAccount().GetAddress(), bucketName,
   259  		&chargedReadQuota, paymentAddr, visibility)
   260  
   261  	// set the default txn broadcast mode as block mode
   262  	if opts.TxOpts == nil {
   263  		broadcastMode := tx.BroadcastMode_BROADCAST_MODE_SYNC
   264  		opts.TxOpts = &gnfdsdk.TxOption{Mode: &broadcastMode}
   265  	}
   266  
   267  	return c.sendTxn(ctx, updateBucketMsg, opts.TxOpts)
   268  }
   269  
   270  // HeadBucket query the bucketInfo on chain, return the bucket info if exists
   271  // return err info if bucket not exist
   272  func (c *client) HeadBucket(ctx context.Context, bucketName string) (*storageTypes.BucketInfo, error) {
   273  	queryHeadBucketRequest := storageTypes.QueryHeadBucketRequest{
   274  		BucketName: bucketName,
   275  	}
   276  	queryHeadBucketResponse, err := c.chainClient.HeadBucket(ctx, &queryHeadBucketRequest)
   277  	if err != nil {
   278  		return nil, err
   279  	}
   280  
   281  	return queryHeadBucketResponse.BucketInfo, nil
   282  }
   283  
   284  // HeadBucketByID query the bucketInfo on chain by bucketId, return the bucket info if exists
   285  // return err info if bucket not exist
   286  func (c *client) HeadBucketByID(ctx context.Context, bucketID string) (*storageTypes.BucketInfo, error) {
   287  	headBucketRequest := &storageTypes.QueryHeadBucketByIdRequest{
   288  		BucketId: bucketID,
   289  	}
   290  
   291  	headBucketResponse, err := c.chainClient.HeadBucketById(ctx, headBucketRequest)
   292  	if err != nil {
   293  		return nil, err
   294  	}
   295  
   296  	return headBucketResponse.BucketInfo, nil
   297  }
   298  
   299  // PutBucketPolicy apply bucket policy to the principal, return the txn hash
   300  func (c *client) PutBucketPolicy(ctx context.Context, bucketName string, principalStr types.Principal,
   301  	statements []*permTypes.Statement, opt types.PutPolicyOption,
   302  ) (string, error) {
   303  	resource := gnfdTypes.NewBucketGRN(bucketName)
   304  	principal := &permTypes.Principal{}
   305  	if err := principal.Unmarshal([]byte(principalStr)); err != nil {
   306  		return "", err
   307  	}
   308  
   309  	putPolicyMsg := storageTypes.NewMsgPutPolicy(c.MustGetDefaultAccount().GetAddress(), resource.String(),
   310  		principal, statements, opt.PolicyExpireTime)
   311  
   312  	return c.sendPutPolicyTxn(ctx, putPolicyMsg, opt.TxOpts)
   313  }
   314  
   315  // DeleteBucketPolicy delete the bucket policy of the principal
   316  func (c *client) DeleteBucketPolicy(ctx context.Context, bucketName string, principalStr types.Principal, opt types.DeletePolicyOption) (string, error) {
   317  	resource := gnfdTypes.NewBucketGRN(bucketName).String()
   318  	principal := &permTypes.Principal{}
   319  	if err := principal.Unmarshal([]byte(principalStr)); err != nil {
   320  		return "", err
   321  	}
   322  
   323  	return c.sendDelPolicyTxn(ctx, c.MustGetDefaultAccount().GetAddress(), resource, principal, opt.TxOpts)
   324  }
   325  
   326  // IsBucketPermissionAllowed check if the permission of bucket is allowed to the user.
   327  func (c *client) IsBucketPermissionAllowed(ctx context.Context, userAddr string,
   328  	bucketName string, action permTypes.ActionType,
   329  ) (permTypes.Effect, error) {
   330  	_, err := sdk.AccAddressFromHexUnsafe(userAddr)
   331  	if err != nil {
   332  		return permTypes.EFFECT_DENY, err
   333  	}
   334  	verifyReq := storageTypes.QueryVerifyPermissionRequest{
   335  		Operator:   userAddr,
   336  		BucketName: bucketName,
   337  		ActionType: action,
   338  	}
   339  
   340  	verifyResp, err := c.chainClient.VerifyPermission(ctx, &verifyReq)
   341  	if err != nil {
   342  		return permTypes.EFFECT_DENY, err
   343  	}
   344  
   345  	return verifyResp.Effect, nil
   346  }
   347  
   348  // GetBucketPolicy get the bucket policy info of the user specified by principalAddr.
   349  func (c *client) GetBucketPolicy(ctx context.Context, bucketName string, principalAddr string) (*permTypes.Policy, error) {
   350  	_, err := sdk.AccAddressFromHexUnsafe(principalAddr)
   351  	if err != nil {
   352  		return nil, err
   353  	}
   354  
   355  	resource := gnfdTypes.NewBucketGRN(bucketName).String()
   356  	queryPolicy := storageTypes.QueryPolicyForAccountRequest{
   357  		Resource:         resource,
   358  		PrincipalAddress: principalAddr,
   359  	}
   360  
   361  	queryPolicyResp, err := c.chainClient.QueryPolicyForAccount(ctx, &queryPolicy)
   362  	if err != nil {
   363  		return nil, err
   364  	}
   365  
   366  	return queryPolicyResp.Policy, nil
   367  }
   368  
   369  // ListBuckets list buckets for the owner
   370  func (c *client) ListBuckets(ctx context.Context) (types.ListBucketsResult, error) {
   371  	reqMeta := requestMeta{
   372  		contentSHA256: types.EmptyStringSHA256,
   373  		userAddress:   c.MustGetDefaultAccount().GetAddress().String(),
   374  	}
   375  
   376  	sendOpt := sendOptions{
   377  		method:           http.MethodGet,
   378  		disableCloseBody: true,
   379  	}
   380  
   381  	endpoint, err := c.getInServiceSP()
   382  	if err != nil {
   383  		log.Error().Msg(fmt.Sprintf("get in-service SP fail %s", err.Error()))
   384  		return types.ListBucketsResult{}, err
   385  	}
   386  
   387  	resp, err := c.sendReq(ctx, reqMeta, &sendOpt, endpoint)
   388  	if err != nil {
   389  		log.Error().Msg("the list of user's buckets failed: " + err.Error())
   390  		return types.ListBucketsResult{}, err
   391  	}
   392  	defer utils.CloseResponse(resp)
   393  
   394  	listBucketsResult := types.ListBucketsResult{}
   395  	// unmarshal the json content from response body
   396  	buf := new(strings.Builder)
   397  	_, err = io.Copy(buf, resp.Body)
   398  	if err != nil {
   399  		log.Error().Msg("the list of user's buckets failed: " + err.Error())
   400  		return types.ListBucketsResult{}, err
   401  	}
   402  
   403  	bufStr := buf.String()
   404  	err = json.Unmarshal([]byte(bufStr), &listBucketsResult)
   405  
   406  	// TODO(annie) remove tolerance for unmarshal err after structs got stabilized
   407  	if err != nil && listBucketsResult.Buckets == nil {
   408  		return types.ListBucketsResult{}, err
   409  	}
   410  
   411  	return listBucketsResult, nil
   412  }
   413  
   414  // ListBucketReadRecord returns the read record of this month, the return items should be no more than maxRecords
   415  // ListReadRecordOption indicates the start timestamp of return read records
   416  func (c *client) ListBucketReadRecord(ctx context.Context, bucketName string, opts types.ListReadRecordOptions) (types.QuotaRecordInfo, error) {
   417  	if err := s3util.CheckValidBucketName(bucketName); err != nil {
   418  		return types.QuotaRecordInfo{}, err
   419  	}
   420  	timeNow := time.Now()
   421  	timeToday := time.Date(timeNow.Year(), timeNow.Month(), timeNow.Day(), 0, 0, 0, 0, timeNow.Location())
   422  	if opts.StartTimeStamp < 0 {
   423  		return types.QuotaRecordInfo{}, errors.New("start timestamp  less than 0")
   424  	}
   425  	var startTimeStamp int64
   426  	if opts.StartTimeStamp == 0 {
   427  		// the timestamp of the first day of this month
   428  		startTimeStamp = timeToday.AddDate(0, 0, -timeToday.Day()+1).UnixMicro()
   429  	} else {
   430  		startTimeStamp = opts.StartTimeStamp
   431  	}
   432  	// the timestamp of the last day of this month
   433  	timeMonthEnd := timeToday.AddDate(0, 1, -timeToday.Day()+1).UnixMicro()
   434  
   435  	if timeMonthEnd < startTimeStamp {
   436  		return types.QuotaRecordInfo{}, errors.New("start timestamp larger than the end timestamp of this month")
   437  	}
   438  
   439  	params := url.Values{}
   440  	params.Set("list-read-record", "")
   441  	if opts.MaxRecords > 0 {
   442  		params.Set("max-records", strconv.Itoa(opts.MaxRecords))
   443  	} else {
   444  		params.Set("max-records", strconv.Itoa(math.MaxUint32))
   445  	}
   446  
   447  	params.Set("start-timestamp", strconv.FormatInt(startTimeStamp, 10))
   448  	params.Set("end-timestamp", strconv.FormatInt(timeMonthEnd, 10))
   449  
   450  	reqMeta := requestMeta{
   451  		urlValues:     params,
   452  		bucketName:    bucketName,
   453  		contentSHA256: types.EmptyStringSHA256,
   454  	}
   455  
   456  	sendOpt := sendOptions{
   457  		method:           http.MethodGet,
   458  		disableCloseBody: true,
   459  	}
   460  
   461  	endpoint, err := c.getSPUrlByBucket(bucketName)
   462  	if err != nil {
   463  		log.Error().Msg(fmt.Sprintf("route endpoint by bucket: %s failed, err: %s", bucketName, err.Error()))
   464  		return types.QuotaRecordInfo{}, err
   465  	}
   466  
   467  	resp, err := c.sendReq(ctx, reqMeta, &sendOpt, endpoint)
   468  	if err != nil {
   469  		return types.QuotaRecordInfo{}, err
   470  	}
   471  	defer utils.CloseResponse(resp)
   472  
   473  	QuotaRecords := types.QuotaRecordInfo{}
   474  	// decode the xml content from response body
   475  	err = xml.NewDecoder(resp.Body).Decode(&QuotaRecords)
   476  	if err != nil {
   477  		return types.QuotaRecordInfo{}, err
   478  	}
   479  
   480  	return QuotaRecords, nil
   481  }
   482  
   483  // GetBucketReadQuota return quota info of bucket of current month, include chain quota, free quota and consumed quota
   484  func (c *client) GetBucketReadQuota(ctx context.Context, bucketName string) (types.QuotaInfo, error) {
   485  	if err := s3util.CheckValidBucketName(bucketName); err != nil {
   486  		return types.QuotaInfo{}, err
   487  	}
   488  
   489  	year, month, _ := time.Now().Date()
   490  	var date string
   491  	if int(month) < 10 {
   492  		date = strconv.Itoa(year) + "-" + "0" + strconv.Itoa(int(month))
   493  	} else {
   494  		date = strconv.Itoa(year) + "-" + strconv.Itoa(int(month))
   495  	}
   496  
   497  	params := url.Values{}
   498  	params.Add("read-quota", "")
   499  	params.Add("year-month", date)
   500  
   501  	reqMeta := requestMeta{
   502  		urlValues:     params,
   503  		bucketName:    bucketName,
   504  		contentSHA256: types.EmptyStringSHA256,
   505  	}
   506  
   507  	sendOpt := sendOptions{
   508  		method:           http.MethodGet,
   509  		disableCloseBody: true,
   510  	}
   511  
   512  	endpoint, err := c.getSPUrlByBucket(bucketName)
   513  	if err != nil {
   514  		log.Error().Msg(fmt.Sprintf("route endpoint by bucket: %s failed, err: %s", bucketName, err.Error()))
   515  		return types.QuotaInfo{}, err
   516  	}
   517  
   518  	resp, err := c.sendReq(ctx, reqMeta, &sendOpt, endpoint)
   519  	if err != nil {
   520  		return types.QuotaInfo{}, err
   521  	}
   522  	defer utils.CloseResponse(resp)
   523  
   524  	QuotaResult := types.QuotaInfo{}
   525  	// decode the xml content from response body
   526  	err = xml.NewDecoder(resp.Body).Decode(&QuotaResult)
   527  	if err != nil {
   528  		return types.QuotaInfo{}, err
   529  	}
   530  
   531  	return QuotaResult, nil
   532  }
   533  
   534  // BuyQuotaForBucket buy the target quota of the specific bucket
   535  // targetQuota indicates the target quota to set for the bucket
   536  func (c *client) BuyQuotaForBucket(ctx context.Context, bucketName string, targetQuota uint64, opt types.BuyQuotaOption) (string, error) {
   537  	bucketInfo, err := c.HeadBucket(ctx, bucketName)
   538  	if err != nil {
   539  		return "", err
   540  	}
   541  
   542  	paymentAddr, err := sdk.AccAddressFromHexUnsafe(bucketInfo.PaymentAddress)
   543  	if err != nil {
   544  		return "", err
   545  	}
   546  	updateBucketMsg := storageTypes.NewMsgUpdateBucketInfo(c.MustGetDefaultAccount().GetAddress(), bucketName, &targetQuota, paymentAddr, bucketInfo.Visibility)
   547  
   548  	resp, err := c.chainClient.BroadcastTx(ctx, []sdk.Msg{updateBucketMsg}, opt.TxOpts)
   549  	if err != nil {
   550  		return "", err
   551  	}
   552  
   553  	return resp.TxResponse.TxHash, err
   554  }
   555  
   556  // ListBucketsByBucketID list buckets by bucket ids
   557  // By inputting a collection of bucket IDs, we can retrieve the corresponding bucket data.
   558  // If the bucket is nonexistent or has been deleted, a null value will be returned
   559  func (c *client) ListBucketsByBucketID(ctx context.Context, bucketIds []uint64) (types.ListBucketsByBucketIDResponse, error) {
   560  	const MaximumListBucketsSize = 1000
   561  	if len(bucketIds) == 0 || len(bucketIds) > MaximumListBucketsSize {
   562  		return types.ListBucketsByBucketIDResponse{}, nil
   563  	}
   564  
   565  	objectIDMap := make(map[uint64]bool)
   566  	for _, id := range bucketIds {
   567  		if _, ok := objectIDMap[id]; ok {
   568  			// repeat id keys in request
   569  			return types.ListBucketsByBucketIDResponse{}, nil
   570  		}
   571  		objectIDMap[id] = true
   572  	}
   573  
   574  	params := url.Values{}
   575  	params.Set("buckets-query", "")
   576  
   577  	reqMeta := requestMeta{
   578  		urlValues:     params,
   579  		contentSHA256: types.EmptyStringSHA256,
   580  	}
   581  
   582  	b, err := json.Marshal(types.ObjectAndBucketIDs{IDs: bucketIds})
   583  	if err != nil {
   584  		return types.ListBucketsByBucketIDResponse{}, err
   585  	}
   586  
   587  	sendOpt := sendOptions{
   588  		method:           http.MethodPost,
   589  		body:             bytes.NewBuffer(b),
   590  		disableCloseBody: true,
   591  	}
   592  
   593  	endpoint, err := c.getInServiceSP()
   594  	if err != nil {
   595  		log.Error().Msg(fmt.Sprintf("get in-service SP fail %s", err.Error()))
   596  		return types.ListBucketsByBucketIDResponse{}, err
   597  	}
   598  
   599  	resp, err := c.sendReq(ctx, reqMeta, &sendOpt, endpoint)
   600  	if err != nil {
   601  		return types.ListBucketsByBucketIDResponse{}, err
   602  	}
   603  	defer utils.CloseResponse(resp)
   604  
   605  	// unmarshal the json content from response body
   606  	buf := new(strings.Builder)
   607  	_, err = io.Copy(buf, resp.Body)
   608  	if err != nil {
   609  		log.Error().Msgf("the list of buckets in bucket ids:%v failed: %s", bucketIds, err.Error())
   610  		return types.ListBucketsByBucketIDResponse{}, err
   611  	}
   612  
   613  	buckets := types.ListBucketsByBucketIDResponse{}
   614  	bufStr := buf.String()
   615  	err = json.Unmarshal([]byte(bufStr), &buckets)
   616  	if err != nil && buckets.Buckets == nil {
   617  		log.Error().Msgf("the list of buckets in bucket ids:%v failed: %s", bucketIds, err.Error())
   618  		return types.ListBucketsByBucketIDResponse{}, err
   619  	}
   620  
   621  	return buckets, nil
   622  }
   623
